languages.text: "Комендант явно не в себе. Он когда-то пытался управлять заключенными через поощрения, и даже давал им выходные дни! Чистое безумие".
"The warden is clearly not of sound mind. At one point, he was trying to manage the inmates by offering incentives and even days of rest! What utter madness!"
languages.original_text: "Комендант явно не в себе. Он когда-то пытался управлять заключенными через поощрения, и даже давал им выходные дни! Чистое безумие".

traits.locale_text: "The warden is clearly not of sound mind. At one point, he was trying to manage his inmates by offering incentives and even days of relief! What madness!"
"The warden is clearly not of sound mind. At one point, he was trying to manage his inmates by offering incentives and even days of relief! What madness!"
"The warden is clearly not of sound mind. At one point, he was trying to manage the inmates by offering incentives and even days of rest! What utter madness!"
"The warden is clearly not of sound mind. At one point, he was trying to manage the inmates by offering incentives and even days of rest! What utter madness!"
"The warden is clearly not of sound mind. At one point, he was trying to manage the inmates by offering incentives and even days of rest! What utter madness!"
"The warden is clearly not of sound mind. At one point, he was trying to manage the inmates by offering incentives and even days of rest! What utter madness!"

languages.text: «Está claro que el alcaide no está en su sano juicio. En una ocasión, ¡intentó controlar a los reclusos ofreciendo incentivos e incluso días de descanso! ¡Qué insensatez!».
languages.original_text: "The warden is clearly not of sound mind. At one point, he was trying to manage the inmates by offering incentives and even days of rest! What utter madness!"

traits.locale_text: «Está claro que el alcaide no está en su sano juicio. En una ocasión, ¡intentó controlar a los reclusos ofreciendo incentivos e incluso días de descanso! ¡Qué insensatez!».

languages.text: "Der Direktor ist offensichtlich nicht recht bei Verstand. Einmal hat er versucht, die Insassen im Zaum zu halten, indem er ihnen Anreize und sogar freie Tage angeboten hat! Welch ein Irrsinn!"
languages.original_text: "The warden is clearly not of sound mind. At one point, he was trying to manage the inmates by offering incentives and even days of rest! What utter madness!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Direktor ist offensichtlich nicht recht bei Verstand. Einmal hat er versucht, die Insassen im Zaum zu halten, indem er ihnen Anreize und sogar freie Tage angeboten hat! Welch ein Irrsinn!"

languages.text: « Il est évident que le directeur a perdu la raison. Il en était venu à tenter de gérer les prisonniers en leur offrant des bonus, et même des jours de relâche ! Ça n'a aucun sens ! »
languages.original_text: "The warden is clearly not of sound mind. At one point, he was trying to manage the inmates by offering incentives and even days of rest! What utter madness!"

traits.locale_text: « Il est évident que le directeur a perdu la raison. Il en était venu à tenter de gérer les prisonniers en leur offrant des bonus, et même des jours de relâche ! Ça n'a aucun sens ! »

languages.text: “那个典狱长的精神显然不太正常。比如说，他打算为犯人提供奖励，甚至打算通过提供休息日来管理那些犯人！这简直是彻底疯了！”
languages.original_text: "The warden is clearly not of sound mind. At one point, he was trying to manage the inmates by offering incentives and even days of rest! What utter madness!"

traits.locale_text: “那个典狱长的精神显然不太正常。比如说，他打算为犯人提供奖励，甚至打算通过提供休息日来管理那些犯人！这简直是彻底疯了！”

languages.text: 「あの所長は明らかに正気ではない。一時は、報酬や休養日まで与えて囚人を管理しようとしていた！まったく狂気の沙汰だ！」
languages.original_text: "The warden is clearly not of sound mind. At one point, he was trying to manage the inmates by offering incentives and even days of rest! What utter madness!"

traits.locale_text: 「あの所長は、明らかに精神がやられている。あるときは、やる気だとか何日かの休暇だとかを与えて囚人を管理しようとしていた！頭でも沸いているのか！」
「あの所長は明らかに正気ではない。一時は、報酬や休養日まで与えて囚人を管理しようとしていた！まったく狂気の沙汰だ！」

languages.text: "Müdürün akli dengesinin yerinde olmadığı açık. Mahkûmları teşvik ve hatta izin günü sunarak yönetmeye kalkışmış! Zırdelilik!"
languages.original_text: "The warden is clearly not of sound mind. At one point, he was trying to manage the inmates by offering incentives and even days of rest! What utter madness!"

traits.locale_text: "Müdürün akli dengesinin yerinde olmadığı açık. Mahkûmları teşvik ve hatta izin günü sunarak yönetmeye kalkışmış! Zırdelilik!"
